channel.title: Need help with 2 important thing please :)
channel.description: i was wondering how to block your client from people with cheat clients. like so it would say you need a members account to use this world 2. how to block a player from trading for the first 60minutes?

item.description:

hmm idk you could make a custom client without the option to change ip then they wouldnt know it. unless they downloaded the client went into gui and got it but dont worry about it
